## Clustering

```{r}
library(igraph)
matched005 = matched_Vidal[Motif1 %in% unique(occurence_vidal005$Pattern) & NormIC > 0.75]
matched005_graph = graph_from_edgelist(as.matrix(unique(matched005[,.(Motif1, Name2)])))
E(matched005_graph)$weight = unique(matched005[,.(Motif1, Name2, NormIC)])$NormIC
plot(matched005_graph)

#only works for undirected graphs, which this example is fine since symetric
fc = fastgreedy.community(as.undirected(matched005_graph), weights = E(matched005_graph)$weight)

#make colors for different communities
V(matched005_graph)$color = membership(fc)
V(matched005_graph)$shape = ifelse(V(matched005_graph)$name %in% matched005$Motif1, "square", "circle")
V(matched005_graph)$label.cex = sqrt(sqrt(degree(matched005_graph) / max(degree(matched005_graph))))
V(matched005_graph)$label.color = ifelse(V(matched005_graph)$name %in% matched005$Motif1, "darkblue", "black")
E(matched005_graph)$arrow.size = 0
l = layout_with_fr(matched005_graph, weights = E(matched005_graph)$weight)
l = norm_coords(l, ymin=-0.4, ymax=0.4, xmin=-0.8, xmax=0.8)
plot(matched005_graph, rescale=FALSE, vertex.size = 5, layout = l*1.4) #vertex.label.cex = 0.7
```
